    • Method Detail

      • find

        public Region find(java.lang.Integer id)
            throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve the region in the database associated to a unique ID
        Parameters:
        id: - the unique ID of the required region
        Returns:
        the region associated to the given unique ID
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.NoResultException - if the search didn't return any result

      • find

        @Transactional
public Region find(java.lang.String name)
            throws javax.persistence.NoResultException
        Retrieve a region in the Database by its name. It isn't supposed to be 2 regions with the same name, but if it happened to be the case, only one region would be returned.
        Parameters:
        name: - the name of the region to retrieve
        Returns:
        the region matching the given name
        Throws:
        NoResultException: - if no region with the given name is found in the database
        javax.persistence.NoResultException

      • getAll

        @Transactional
public java.util.List<Region> getAll()
        Retrieve a list of all the regions in the database
        Returns:
        the list of all the regions in the database

      • performQueryAndCheckResultList

        private java.util.List<Region> performQueryAndCheckResultList(javax.persistence.Query query)
        Perform a query and check the result list is of the right type
        Parameters:
        query: - the query to execute
        Returns:
        the list of regions returned by the query and checked
